description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Defend the homeland against the capitalist pigs, or siege the communist headquarters to prevent their victory on earth and in space.  Play with up to 4 players in this fast-paced tower defense game.
description.short: Defend the homeland against the capitalist pigs, or siege the communist headquarters to prevent their victory on earth and in space.  Play with up to 4 players in this fast-paced tower defense game.
